name: Room of Misfortune
description:
Four girls are trapped in a classroom with a stranger who forces them to play their childhood game called Room of Misfortune or death awaits them.

Inspired by Weekly Game Jam #99: Escape from School

The download is an unfinished prototype. I plan to be done with the game by June 30, 2019 at noon.

I will be uploading the changes I make to the game weekly. Hope you enjoy.

Controls

Use ARROW KEYS to move.

Use the ENTER key to interact with objects and people.
